title: Sungacha
text:
The Sungacha or Songacha ( "Sungacha" or Сунгач "Sungach", ) is a river marking part of the border between the <a href="Russian%20Federation">Russian Federation</a> and the <a href="People%27s%20Republic%20of%20China">People's Republic of China</a>. It is a left tributary of the <a href="Ussuri">Ussuri</a>, and the only outflow of <a href="Khanka%20Lake">Khanka Lake</a>.
The -long Sungacha's length fluctuates, as the <a href="stream%20bed">stream bed</a> changes every year. The area of its <a href="Drainage%20basin">basin</a> is approximately , of which within Russia.
The river supports a rich diversity of <a href="flora">flora</a> and <a href="fauna">fauna</a>, including "<a href="Nelumbo%20nucifera">Nelumbo nucifera</a>" in its basin.
The Sungacha's waters come from rain, snow and <a href="Spring%20%28hydrosphere%29">springs</a>.
